tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Tiger, Tiger
programme.desc: Harm takes Josh on a weekend cruise for Navy families aboard a frigate. When the frigate is taken over by terrorists who intend to fire missiles at Cuba, Harm and Bud take matters into their own hands to stop the evil plot.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Return of Mimmy Blackhorse
programme.desc: An Army forensic pathologist joins forces with Harm, Mac, Bud and Harriet as they try to verify that newly unearthed human remains are those of a heroic Navajo "code-talker" who had been missing since WWII.(n)

programme.title: JAG: The Imposter
programme.desc: Harm is held captive by Palmer, a renegade government agent with whom he had crossed swords a few months ago. While Palmer prepares a life mask so he can pass for Harm, he explains his plans to assassinate the key witness in the trial.(n)

programme.title: JAG: To Russia With Love
programme.desc: With evidence that his missing father could still be alive in, Harm convinces the Admiral to give him time off so he can go to Russia. In Moscow, they are questioned by Mark Falcon, the KGB agent who had stolen a list of POW's earlier from Harm.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Gypsy Eyes
programme.desc: Unable to lose the pursuing Russian fighters, Harm's and Mac’s hijacked Mig is shot out of the sky over Siberia.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Act of Terror
programme.desc: When Arab terrorists attach a mine to a US Navy warship in an attempt to sink it, Marine guards are able to kill one and capture the other, even after the mine explodes, killing two sailors.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: More Extinction
programme.desc: Team Scorpion continues to work with their nemesis, Mark Collins, in order to prevent an extinction event that could end humanity. Also, Cabe's last-minute decision while on the case leads to the possible end of his career.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Grow a Deer, A Female Deer
programme.sub-title: Grow a Deer, A Female Deer
programme.desc: When poachers almost kill a pregnant endangered deer, Team Scorpion recreates the animal's womb to try to save it and its baby's life. Also, Happy and Toby discuss the future of their family.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Nuke Kids on the Block
programme.desc: While decommissioning an old nuclear missile, a simple accident causes Team Scorpion to endure exposure to toxic vapor while trying to prevent the nuke from detonating.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Sci Hard
programme.desc: While attending a tech convention, Team Scorpion is taken hostage by a group attempting a virtual heist.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Queen Scary
programme.desc: At Halloween, Team Scorpion takes on a case to prove the existence of ghosts on the Queen Mary but find an all-too-real disaster when they locate a 'ghost ship' on a deadly collision course.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Go With the Florence
programme.desc: While tracking a device that can prevent a nuclear meltdown through the Los Angeles sewers, Walter learns the nuances of listening and not offering advice to Paige.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Perfect Family
programme.desc: Andy’s ideas about what makes a perfect family are put into perspective when she meets an out-of-control teen who needs to be protected from her own conservative family.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Uprising
programme.desc: A riot breaks out at a women’s correctional institute while Andy, Juliet, Nick, and Gail are there to transfer prisoners. They end up in a lock-down situation that finds Andy and Juliet trapped with a woman desperate to prove her innocence.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Letting Go
programme.desc: When Nick’s estranged older brother emerges with new information on someone from their tragic past, Nick goes off the grid to track the man down. But Juliet is hot on his heels, and Nick is forced to let her into the secrets of his past.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: A Real Gentleman
programme.desc: When Traci is a no-show for her first raid, 15 Division fears the notorious gun dealer they’re after has kidnapped her. But when Andy realizes that the serial rapist we never caught is back, it’s all hands on deck to find Traci.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Home Run
programme.desc: After a community-outreach baseball game erupts in a drive-by shooting, Gail’s relationship with her brother is put to the test . Meanwhile, Swarek plans a getaway with Andy up to Oliver’s cabin, which goes off the rails in every possible way.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Best Man
programme.desc: Andy and Sam are shocked to learn that Oliver is the prime suspect in IA’s corruption investigation into 15 Division. They only have until end of day today to find Chris Klem – the missing explosives-dealer – and clear Oliver’s name.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Fort Paull Part 2
programme.desc: Part 2. The Most Haunted team explore the underground of Fort Paull. With its foundations and footprint dating back 100’s of years the team are faced with some terrifying ordeals.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Knottingley Town Hall
programme.desc: This location is said to be overflowing with paranormal activity, which doesn’t disappoint.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Oakwell House
programme.desc: The team investigate Oakwell House near Leeds, which was built by ancestors of Fred Batt. In 1684, William Batt returned unexpectedly from a trip to London but vanished leaving a bloody footprint. A demon dog has been seen in the grounds.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Tatton Hall
programme.desc: Something about Tatton Old Hall keeps bringing the Most Haunted team back. Something happens that stops two of the team entering, a poltergeist causes confusion and the team get a clear voice from beyond the veil.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Tivoli Venue
programme.desc: A well-known venue for accomplished as well as up and coming bands The Tivoli Venue boasts many a ghost. In this episode one of the team gets a warning from the other side that reduces them to tears and something seems to be stalking the team.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Wentworth Woodhouse Part 1
programme.desc: Part 1. The upper floors of Wentworth House are a maze of corridors and rooms and the team have one night to investigate as many as possible. With one whistling spirit, groans and loud noises the team are shaken to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 12
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Hindenburg Crash Site
programme.desc: In the exciting season finale, TAPS travels to the site where Hindenburg, one of history's most infamous disasters, took place.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Too Many Apparitions in the Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Too Many Apparitions in the Kitchen
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, the Culinary Institute of America in Hyde Park, New Yorkcalls in TAPS to find out if the spirits of Jesuit priests still roam the areas where they once lived, worked and were buried when it was a seminary.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Dead Presidents
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to King George, Virginia to become the first paranormal team to investigate Belle Grove Plantation.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Higher Dead/ucation
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Bowling Green, Kentucky to investigate Western Kentucky University's three stories of death and terrifying paranormal activity.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 10
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: What Happens to a Rev Deferred?
programme.sub-title: What Happens to a Rev Deferred?
programme.desc: The Andromeda receives a cry for help from Rev Bam.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Point of the Spear
programme.desc: After a Commonwealth planet is attacked by Pyrian pyroformers, Dylan is forced to fight to protect the new planet.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Vault of the Heavens
programme.desc: Dylan hears voices beckoning him to a planet of "fire and ice.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Deep Midnight's Voice
programme.desc: While caught in a battle between two Nietzschean prides, the crew captures a hostile who claims that his pride possesses a map of the slipstream.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Illusion of Majesty
programme.desc: A wrong turn after exiting a slipstream sends the Andromeda into the Prolon system. They rescue an escape pod from certain disaster, but the pride wants it back.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.195
programme.desc: Slashed tires are the end result when feuding neighbors share adjacent parking spaces.\t\t\t\r\nFake diamond earrings, serious bouts of jealously, and dueling restraining orders come into play when ex-lovers fight over an unpaid loan.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.106
programme.desc: Former friend sues woman for car accidents and repossessions after buying car in his name/Pool party ends in fight over iPhone ruined when girl pushed into pool.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.148
programme.desc: Jealousy leads to candlestick attack on ex's truck window. Teen sues friend for car damage; friend admits drinking led to incident.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.29
programme.desc: Siblings dispute deceased grandmother's estate, personal property, and damages from alleged mutual assault/Woman sues ex-boyfriend for alleged life-threatening phone call over broken apartment lease, involving alleged marijuana and meth use.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.78
programme.desc: Woman sues ex-lover for $2,000 in bad checks; he claims fault lies elsewhere, some money intended for her move. Man disputes ex-fiancée over unpaid balance on engagement ring and jewelry; claims she has most of the valuables in question.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.192
programme.desc: Children's game 'sack tap' leads to injury; parents sue. Bitter divorce sparks fights over car vandalism, attorney fees, and pain claims.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.245
programme.desc: A woman hits a parked Jaguar while parallel parking, facing a lawsuit from her father for unpaid parking tickets and car damage. Another woman sues her ex-fiancé for his share of a canceled wedding, a loan for a car, and unpaid credit card charges.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.3
programme.desc: A mother confesses to buying alcohol for underage teens who get drunk, throw rocks at cars and are ordered to pay $18,000 in restitution/Court fines for selling cigarettes to a minor are disputed by feuding sisters.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.9
programme.desc: An Escalade rental for a group of partying teenagers ends in a lawsuit between a limo company and a frustrated mother who claims she was lied to by the owner.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.184
programme.desc: Special laundry privileges after a divorce, followed by alleged\t\t\t\r\nstalking and assault charges, leave an ex-husband very angry about\t\t\t\r\nbeing arrested; he sues his ex for damages.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.75
programme.desc: Young man admits to being drunk and possessing marijuana but denies throwing rock through woman's window. Man cares for injured mother after father's death; fight over credit card debt and estate divides them.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: International culinary experts serve as guest judges when the three finalists create dishes from various parts of the world.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The final two chefs do battle in the final challenge and dinner service; chef Ramsay chooses the winner.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay announces that the 16 contestants must successfully complete the opening dinner service, but he may be forced to eat his words.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The team with the most properly cooked eggs wins a helicopter tour of Los Angeles; when a chef gets into an argument with Ramsay, it threatens a team.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The cheerleaders and members of the marching band from the University of Southern California have their lunch prepared by the remaining contestants.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The next challenge has an element of the unknown to it, as the contestants must create dishes using ingredients chosen by the roll of a die.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Purdy’s dominates the West Coast, but is struggling to make an impression elsewhere. To boost sales, the Chocolate Queen travels the country, working in disguise in her own stores and factory floors.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: PJ’s Pets is one of the nation’s oldest pet store chains, but the company has a new President in place, and she’s determined to rattle a few cages. Margaret Kordas steps out of her stilettos when she spends a week working in her own stores.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: For nearly 20 years, T&T Supermarket dominated sales, but now competition is “cut throat”. That's good enough reason for Tina Lee, the boss of T&T Supermarket, to swap her upscale lifestyle for a week working undercover in her own stores.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Lynne Zappone, the Chief Talent Officer of Popeye’s Louisiana Kitchen, a restaurant chain that generates more than $2 billion in annual revenue, goes undercover posing as a participant in a reality show called Job Swap.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Jose Mas, the CEO of MasTec, one of the largest builders of telecommunication and energy systems in North America, poses as a recently laid off high school basketball coach, getting a second chance at starting a new career.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Lisa Lisson, the first female president of FedEx Express Canada, goes undercover to find out if her employees have the right resources to provide exceptional service in the fiercely competitive courier industry.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Tactical Planning
programme.desc: Matt, Froy, and Lou get a tip on a car whose owner has a boyfriend known for taking his fists to repossessors. Then, Lou and Matt derail an international expedition when they haul off with a tourist bus. And, Sonia and Froy bring some unwanted heat...(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Four Wheel Surprise
programme.desc: Matt and Froy walk into a moral gray area when they repossess a vehicle by stealing it. Then, Sonia and Matt discover their target van is being used in an investigation of highly toxic material. And, Matt poses as a valet to retrieve a car from an irate..(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Breakdowns and Beatdowns
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy head into a bad part of town to find that their target car is owned by bat-equipped gang bangers. Then, a seemingly friendly teacher and an assistant principal nearly come to blows when Froy and Sonia come around to repossess.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: You Again?
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Lou get the shock of a lifetime when they repossess a car from an irate doctor whom they know all too well from an earlier incident. This time he's twice as angry, and he's dead-set against giving up his car again.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Scavenger Hunt
programme.desc: First, Lou and Froy transform their search for a small dirt bike into a quasi-reality show, getting a group of young smart-asses trapped in their own web. Then, Sonia and Matt head to the business district for a different sort of quarry.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Dune Buggy
programme.desc: First, Lou and Froy tail an upper-class debtor to an upscale restaurant where the food is almost as unpalatable as its clientele's attitude. Then, Lyndah and Froy head to a residential district to repossess a van.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Indian Giver
programme.desc: Audrey is surprised by Jeff's sudden interest in her favorite reality show until she discovers the reason. Meanwhile, to Russell's delight, Timmy has second thoughts about his impending arranged marriage.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: 3rd Wheel
programme.desc: Unbeknownst to Jeff, Audrey lies to her homely friend Liz that she is on Jeff's list of women he would sleep with if Audrey were not around.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Snoozin' For A Bruisin'
programme.desc: When Jeff and Audrey switch sides of the bed, Jeff accidentally rolls over and clocks Audrey in the face, landing her in the hospital.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Reunion
programme.desc: Audrey attends her high school reunion intent on proving to her former classmates how great her life is in New York City. Meanwhile, Russell accidentally ruins Timmy's dinner party.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Free Free Time
programme.desc: When Audrey's weekly girls' night out is canceled, Jeff seeks out time alone; however, his plans are foiled every step of the way. Meanwhile, Russell discovers that Timmy has a lot of pent-up aggression toward him.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Score
programme.desc: Jeff spends the evening trying to avoid learning the score of a Rangers game after Audrey forces him to give up his tickets and go to her boss' party instead. Meanwhile, at the game, Russell is mortified when Timmy roots against the home team.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Atlantic City
programme.desc: Audrey tries to make Jeff feel guilty for not telling her that his friend's bachelor party in Atlantic City was canceled; however, her plan backfires when Jeff discovers that Audrey is also being deceitful.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Harassment
programme.desc: A new employee with an axe to grind against Audrey files a sexual harassment claim against her. Meanwhile, after being teased for playing cricket, Timmy challenges Jeff to a game to prove the sport is not for wimps.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Surrogate
programme.desc: An overly enthusiastic Audrey pushes it too far with a surrogate mother who she and Jeff are considering paying to have their baby. Meanwhile, Russell shamelessly pokes fun at Jennifer and Adam's wedding Web site.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: They Do?
programme.desc: Adam and Jennifer plan a secret wedding; however, a series of unfortunate events puts their plan in jeopardy. Meanwhile, to keep Russell and Timmy from finding out about the ceremony, Adam tells them he is staging an intervention for Jeff.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Rug-of-War
programme.desc: Upset that he'll have to purchase a new rug after Audrey gives their old one to Adam and Jenn, Jeff tries to sabotage the gift by telling Adam about all the 'fun' that he and Audrey had on it.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Hunt for Santa
programme.desc: Dog decides he needs to help his son Garry believe in Santa Claus again. So now the Dog, with a posse expanded to include his children and grandchildren, sets off on a hunt through the Colorado Rockies for Santa Claus himself!(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Call Waiting
programme.desc: Dog's target for today has been in trouble with the law since he was a juvenile. And he seems willing to use any trick in the system to avoid capture by Dog. In this match of wits, will Dog prevail?(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Kid Stuff
programme.desc: A fugitive from justice is on the lam and it's Dog's job to find him. When they hit the last known address they discover he already has pulled up stakes and left no forwarding address. The posse's one hope is to locate his girlfriend.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Easy Does It
programme.desc: There is a running joke in the posse that every time Bobby Brown asks them for help with a fugitive, he always promises them it's "an easy one," but the hunts end up being epic searches.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Dog believes in safety first, and today's hunt puts this philosophy to the test. The fugitive's problem with anger management increases the dangers of their already risky line of work. Dog warns the crew to be ready for anything as they head out.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Back in the Hood
programme.desc: Today, Dog's bounty is about to take him on a trip down memory lane and test his investigative chops. With each lead propelling him closer and closer to his childhood haunts, Dog uses old-fashioned detective skills to track his prey.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: One for the Road
programme.desc: Dog is a big-hearted guy. He's helping Mary Ellen, his friend and fellow bondsman, on a dangerous night hunt for a fugitive she is now regretting bailing out. He's also giving his nephew Justin a second chance to rejoin the team.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bait and Switch
programme.desc: Things are seldom what they seem in the world of bounty hunting. When the fugitive's girlfriend offers to help Dog trap this dangerous felon, Dog knows that someone is being deceived. The only question is, whom?(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: True Identity
programme.desc: Dog knows that looks can be deceiving. The fugitive is pretty, petite, and trouble. She stands accused of settling an argument with the help of a box cutter. What Dog does not anticipate is how deceptive this femme fatale can truly be!(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Secrets and Lies
programme.desc: What do you do when you have a fugitive you not only want to find, but believe can be helped back onto the straight and narrow? If you're Mary Ellen you call your good friend Dog.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Ball in the Family
programme.desc: When Willie's old rival Phillip McMillan challenges him to a game of dodgeball, Willie recruits his family members to settle a score once and for all. Meanwhile, Si thinks his cat is cheating on him with another family, so he recruits Miss Kay.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drone Survivor
programme.desc: When Jase and Phil make a bet about whether or not human beings in a duck blind are visible from the air, Jep buys a drone copter to get a "bird's eye" view, but ends up losing it in the process.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Alan in Charge
programme.desc: Jase and the guys convince Willie to hire his older brother Alan to work at Duck Commander, but when Alan begins micromanaging everyone, they quickly change their mind. Meanwhile, the ladies take a self-defense class and use John Luke as a punching bag.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Renaissance Men
programme.desc: When the Robertsons throw a Renaissance Fair birthday party for Godwin, various family members compete in a tournament to win knighthood.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Heroes Welcome
programme.desc: In this special episode, the Duck Commander team surprises two wounded veterans with a trip to Monroe so they can be in an episode of Duck Dynasty. To show their support, the Robertson family stages a color run to bring awareness to our wounded soldiers.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Pie Hard
programme.desc: Willie and Alan agree to help Miss Kay open her own bakery, but things take a turn when Kay is asked to hand over her secret recipes. Meanwhile, the guys in the duck call room take an extended lunch break by driving to Mississippi.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Van He'llsing
programme.desc: When Missy and Jase's son Reed purchases an old van to boost his music career, his parents begin to question some of his choices. Meanwhile, Willie helps Jep prepare River for a competitive wrestling league by introducing him to his friend.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Toad to Perdition
programme.desc: When Willie and his brothers spend too much time frog hunting, their wives challenge them to a "frogging" competition.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: RV There Yet?
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a road trip to Liberty University where they will drop off John Luke and Mary Kate for their first year of college. Along the way, they stop in Nashville to visit Willie's friend Colt Ford.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Willie & Korie's Anniversorry
programme.desc: The Robertson family throws a party for Willie & Korie's 25th anniversary, but things take a dramatic turn when Willie and Korie reveal a big secret. Meanwhile, when Jase blames Uncle Si for getting him a parking ticket.(n)

programme.title: Automata
programme.desc: Jacq Vaucan (Antonio Banderas, 'The Mask of Zorro') is an insurance agent of ROC robotics corporation who investigates cases of robots violating their primary protocols against altering themselves.(n)

programme.title: Rise Of The Fellowship
programme.desc: What if The Lord of the Rings wasn’t just a story? What if it happened to you? Randall Dooley and his friends are outcasts at school, spending most of their time playing online games. After Randall is set up for a crime he didn’t commit.(n)

programme.title: Area Q
programme.desc: After his son disappears a journalist goes to Brazil to investigate, where he discovers close encounter sightings that have taken place in a region known as Area Q, where he may uncover the mystery surrounding his son's disappearance.(n)

programme.title: Kill Bill: Volume 2
programme.desc: The Bride is back with a vengeance and taking aim at the only survivors from the squad of assassins who betrayed her four years earlier. It’s all leading up to the ultimate confrontation with Bill, her former master and the man who ordered her execution!(n)

programme.title: Warrior
programme.desc: WARRIOR tells the moving and inspirational story of the Conlon family, Brendan (Joel Edgerton), Tommy (Tom Hardy) and Paddy (Nick Nolte), who find redemption in the ring as they fight to repair themselves and their family.(n)

programme.title: Lucky Number Slevin
programme.desc: A case of mistaken identity lands Slevin into the middle of a war being plotted by two of the city's most rival crime bosses: The Rabbi and The Boss.(n)

programme.title: Kickboxer
programme.desc: When kickboxing champ Eric Sloane is crippled in the ring by the evil Tong Po, Eric's younger brother, Kurt, seeks vengeance.(n)

programme.title: Descent
programme.desc: A team of scientists are gathered to prevent a global catastrophe. But one of the scientists realizes early on that the cause of volcanic reactions is most likely due to a secret government operation investigating alternative energy resources.(n)

programme.title: Jack Hunter: And The Star of Heaven
programme.desc: Jack Hunter realizes the pharaoh's tomb being empty except for a Roman coin means the treasure was looted to Rome but later probably transferred the the new, Byzantine capital, Constantinople.(n)

programme.title: Megan's Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: When Megan is taken away from the only life she’s ever known and moves to a small town in West Virginia, she struggles to fit in. She also gives up her one true passion, dancing. But the nativity at her local church might just turn her life around.(n)

programme.title: It's Christmas Carol!
programme.desc: Inspired by the Charles Dickens classic A Christmas Carol, It’s Christmas Carol! tells the story of a driven,\n heartless, publishing executive, Carol Huffman, who on Christmas Eve is visited by the ghost of her\n former boss, Eve.(n)

programme.title: Guess Who’s Coming to Christmas Dinner?
programme.desc: Law student Maya brings her new boyfriend home for the holidays, neglecting to tell her family that he's - well - white. Maya has one week to persuade her family that this is true love, will she be able to pull off this Christmas miracle?(n)

programme.title: The Wrong Girl
programme.desc: Sophia is an ideal 17 year old student, who quickly strikes up a friendship with Grace, the new girl in school. But their friendship takes a sinister turn when Grace begins disrupting the lives of Sophia and her family.(n)

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.sub-title: Mary Higgins Clark: We'll Meet Again
programme.desc: Socialite Molly is released from prison after serving a 6-year sentence for the murder of her husband and sets out to prove her innocence with the help of Fran, an investigative reporter who uncovers a conspiracy of silence and a shocking secret.(n)

programme.title: Clover Bend
programme.desc: An LA cop whose wife is killed in a shootout moves back to his hometown, trying to rebuild a life for himself and his children. Unbeknownst to him, his wife's killers are seeking revenge for one of their own who was also killed in the shootout.(n)

programme.title: Ali
programme.desc: Muhammad Ali (Will Smith) battles Sonny Liston, Joe Frazier and George Foreman and raises controversy outside the ring.(n)

programme.title: The Bleeder
programme.desc: Liquor salesman and part-time prizefighter Chuck Wepner gets the chance to take on Muhammad Ali in a highly publicized title fight, launching him to sudden fame.(n)

programme.title: Americano
programme.desc: When a gang of bully birds threaten his father and take over their circus, Cuco the parrot heads to Hollywood to ask TV superhero El Americano for help.(n)

programme.title: Red Sun: Red Sun
programme.desc: In 1870, a gang robs a train and steals a ceremonial Japanese sword meant as a gift for the U.S. President, prompting a manhunt to retrieve it.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: The adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their ranch while helping the surrounding community.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: The adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their ranch while helping the surrounding community.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: Hoss helps ex army scout Charlie Trent (the towns drunk) regain his self-esteem, by volunteering him to lead Captain Pender's men across the desert with a valuable shipment.(n)

programme.title: Legendary
programme.desc: Cal Chetley is a bright, engaging, undersized fifteen year-old who's been picked on most of his life. Cal joins his high school wrestling team in the hopes his brother will train him. More importantly, Cal uses wrestling as the tool to reunite his family.(n)

programme.title: Foster
programme.desc: A heart-warming story of family and friendship starring Academy Award Nominee Toni Collette and Ioan Gruffudd.(n)

programme.title: Black or White
programme.desc: A heart-wrenching drama starring Academy Award Winners Octavia Spencer and Kevin Costner. When Elliot is left to care for his granddaughter Eloise by himself, Eloise’s paternal grandmother seeks custody, drawing them into a long and uncertain battle.(n)

programme.title: Ghost World
programme.desc: The story of neo-cool Enid and Rebecca who, faced with graduation from high school take a hard look at the world they wryly observe. When Rebecca focuses her attention on mutual romantic fixation Josh, the girls friendship is forever changed.(n)

programme.title: Whip It
programme.desc: In Bodeen, Texas, an indie-rock loving misfit finds a way of dealing with her small-town misery after she discovers a roller derby league in nearby Austin.(n)

programme.title: Cottage to Let
programme.desc: Nazis try to learn the plans and location of a secret bomb sight in Scotland from an Allied scientist.(n)

programme.title: Blackmail
programme.desc: A Scotland Yard inspector deals with a blackmailer who knows that the lawman's fiancee killed an artist.(n)

programme.title: Circus of Horrors
programme.desc: Tale about a renegade plastic surgeon on the run from the police, who becomes the owner of a run-down circus. Before long, the performers experience a series of horrific accidents.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) becomes the understudy to the talented, if somewhat inebriated, star of "Man of La Mancha.'' Guest star: Tony Award-winner John Cullum.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) leaps into the life of a college fraternity brother in the late '60s and must prevent a radical student (Stacy Edwards) from bombing the chemistry lab. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) comes to the aid of a divorced mother whose socially awkward teen-age son may make a tragic mistake if he succumbs to peer pressure.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) leaps into the life of a 1962 teen-age football star who desperately tries to prevent a teammate (Richard Coca) from throwing the big game. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) becomes an FBI agent who is assigned to guard a woman (Teri Austin) targeted for assassination by her drug-dealing ex-boss. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Revelations Pt 2
programme.desc: In the season finale of Sanctuary, The Five, led by Magnus, attempt to find the secret labyrinth in the decimated city of Bhalasaam. Once located, they must complete a series of cryptic tests that can only be achieved using the powers of The Five.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: End of Nights Pt 1
programme.desc: Dr. Helen Magnus continues her desperate search for her daughter, Ashley, who is still held prisoner by the Cabal. Together, Magnus and John Druitt interrogate their most elusive contacts.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: End of Nights Pt 2
programme.desc: Still reeling from their violent encounter with the transformed Ashley, Helen Magnus is determined to find answers about the Cabal and their plans for her daughter.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Cell Game (REDUX)
programme.desc: When Dante loses Percy to corrupt Oberon police, he must work out a dangerous deal to free Percy, while she fights for her life in prison.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Blacklight (REDUX)
programme.desc: A cryogenic chamber in an abandoned section of the Tulip is accidentally powered up, and the legendary Colonel Bramwell emerges from a 50-year sleep.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Goodbye So Long (REDUX)
programme.desc: Soon after Dante reconnects with an old friend, he appears to be killed in an accident.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Quadzilla Attacks!
programme.desc: Extreme Quadzilla ATV, the fastest 4 wheeler ever; a 1910s Remington Derringer and an 1880s Palm Squeezer pistol; revolutionary 1800s Western Electric telephone with a crank dial.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Dead Aim
programme.desc: Ton & Allen face-off against an auction buyer with shady bidding tactics and even more questionable fashion sense. The guys find a custom-built monowheel & a rifle designed to ward off grave robbers in the early 19th century!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sidecar Surprise
programme.desc: An unassuming mom in an oversized sweater tries to pull the wool over Ton & Allen's eyes at a storage auction in Arlington, VA. The guys uncover a black powder cannon designed in the 15th century & a Russian military motorcycle!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Beantown Bidders
programme.desc: 1800s blackpowder whaling harpoon; 1940s Schwinn Town & Country tandem bicycle; a vintage American flag collection that could be worth thousands.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Diesel Digs
programme.desc: The guys head to the industrial hub of LA to score some heavy machinery and unearth a 1981 Bobcat 743 Frontloader, one of the first powered by a diesel engine and a trench-defending WWI German Sturmtrupp helmet bashing mace.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Big Easy Money
programme.desc: Allen & Ton head to New Orleans in search of easy money, but instead encounter some bayou bidders with big-time bucks! They discover a pair of early 19th-century dueling pistols & a vintage airboat fitted with a turbine engine!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Fire in the Hole!
programme.desc: 1930s "blasting machine" dynamite detonator box; 1890s treasure chest with secret compartments. Ton smelts jewelry to forge bricks of silver.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Bowling Pin Payday
programme.desc: Allen & Ton visit Ton's old stompin' ground and go head-to-head with a trash-talking auction buyer. They uncover a 19th century rifle with a matching cutlass bayonet and a mechanical bowling pinsetter from the early 1960's!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Auction Hunters, Ink.
programme.desc: Autographed 1960s Bob Shaw Swing Gate tattoo machine; Terry Ives competition 22hp chainsaw; six foot chainsaw-carved cedar bear.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ice, Ice, Baby
programme.desc: Ton and Allen have to get aggressive when they encounter a towering opponent with a mountain of cash. The guys uncover a vintage ice resurfacing machine and an Olympic biathlon rifle!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Chicago Grand Slam
programme.desc: 1984 Yamaha SS440 Snowmobile that introduced the revolutionary shock absorber suspension; rare autographed 1920s baseball glove; mint Hank Aaron signed baseball; authentic 1950s Robby the Robot collector toy.(n)
